title: Eddie Anderson (footballer)
text:
Edward Anderson (born 26 June 1949), is a Scottish former <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="defender%20%28football%29">defender</a>.
Career.
Anderson joined <a href="Clyde%20F.C.">Clyde</a> in 1969, signing from junior side <a href="Kirkintilloch%20Rob%20Roy%20F.C.">Kirkintilloch Rob Roy</a>. He spent his entire senior career with the Bully Wee, making over 350 appearances in all competitions during his 11-year spell at <a href="Shawfield%20Stadium">Shawfield Stadium</a>.
